song.englishname: The Boy Who Stopped The World

english.segment1: Don't think you could stop it now. I'd like to see you try somehow. Realize that it puts it all on you. There's nothing you can do
english.segment2: Right now you're sick and tired. You're feeling sad, feeling uninspired. But the clock just won't slow down. Like it gets it kicks pushing you around
english.segment3: Maybe in the morning it won't be. Quite as bad as it seems
english.segment4: The fact that you can't change. The speed of sound, the rate of age. Is an understatement to. A state of mind your not used to
english.segment5: You'd be forever known. As the boy who stopped the world. And made it his own
english.segment6: Right now you're sick and tired. You're feeling sad. feeling uninspired. So I pray for you my friend. That you'll fall down. You'll give in.
